title: Bitcoin and Ethereum Struggling to Rebound
description: Market Overview The crypto market capitalisation is up about 1% from yesterday’s level, rebounding to $2.24 trillion after plunging to $2.18 trillion on Tuesday. Once again, we are seeing a weak rebound after the dip, underscoring that bears remain in control of the markets. title: Stifel Just Predicted Bitcoin Could Crash to $38,000: The 15-Year Trendline Behind the Call
description: Stifel Financial, a 136-year-old investment bank, says Bitcoin (CRYPTO: BTC) could still fall to $38,000—a 43% drop from current levels near $65,000 and a full 70% crash from October’s $126,000 peak. The firm’s chief equity strategist, Barry Bannister, built the case on 15 years of bear market data. He drew a trendline through every major ... title: Bitcoin (BTC) faces risk of drop to $55K on rising outflows; DeFi crypto reports strong on-chain activity
description: Bitcoin is under renewed pressure as accelerating capital outflows and weakening macro conditions raise the risk of a deeper move toward the $55,000 range. Analysts are closely watching the $60,000 level as critical support, warning that a decisive break could trigger a sharper flush amid thinning liquidity and continued ETF outflows.
